name: xThemeSong
overview: Download theme songs from YouTube or upload custom MP3s for your media library
description: A plugin that automatically downloads theme songs from YouTube by user provided video ID/URL or allows uploading custom MP3 files. Theme songs are saved as theme.mp3 in media folders along with metadata in theme.json files. Supports both movies and TV shows. Features a complete Web UI with drag-and-drop upload.

versions.changelog: Fixed installation issues - now includes all required dependencies (YoutubeExplode.dll, etc.) for proper plugin functionality. Previously missing dependencies caused installation failures.

Fixed infinite retry loop - changed from window.itemHelper to MutationObserver pattern. Now properly detects action sheet menus (.actionSheet) and dynamically injects 'Assign Theme Song' menu item when three-dot menu opens for movies and TV shows.

Fixed infinite retry loop - changed from window.itemHelper to MutationObserver pattern. Now properly detects action sheet menus (.actionSheet) and dynamically injects 'Assign Theme Song' menu item when three-dot menu opens for movies and TV shows.
